greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: LCM of exponents in binary expansion of 2n.
link: Peter Kagey, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
mathematica: lcm[n_]:=Module[{idn2=IntegerDigits[n,2]},LCM@@Pick[Reverse[Range[ Length[ idn2]]], idn2,1]]; Join[{1},Array[lcm,100]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jan 24 2019 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = my(ve = select(x->x==1, Vecrev(binary(2*n)), 1)); lcm(vector(#ve, k, ve[k]-1)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Apr 12 2016
(PARI) a(n)=lcm(Vec(select(x->x, Vecrev(binary(n)), 1))) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Apr 12 2016
results.author: _Peter Kagey_, Apr 11 2016
